segments.text: I have a problem with my credit card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a charge on my card that I didn't make .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me what the charge was ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's for a purse that cost $ 350 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you positive that you didn't buy the purse ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't even afford a purse that expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very sorry . When was this purchase made ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was at work , but the purchase was made at 3
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're going to investigate this claim .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK.Do I have to pay for this charge ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You won't have to pay for anything .
segments.speaker: S2
